mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RUNNING_CREW ( CREW_ID, CREW_TITLE, START_TIME, START_LOCATION, START_LOCATION_MAP_POINT, END_LOCATION, END_LOCATION_MAP_POINT, DISTRICT, CREATED_AT, IS_OVER_15, LEADER_ID, LEADER_NN ) VALUES ( #{crewId}, #{crewTitle}, #{startTime}, #{startLocation}, #{startLocationMapPoint}, #{endLocation}, #{endLocationMapPoint}, #{district}, SYSDATE, #{isOver15}, #{leaderId}, #{leaderNn} )
mapper.select: SELECT rc.CREW_ID AS crewId, rc.CREW_TITLE AS crewTitle, rc.START_LOCATION AS startLocation, rc.END_LOCATION AS endLocation, rc.START_LOCATION_MAP_POINT AS startLocationMapPoint, rc.END_LOCATION_MAP_POINT AS endLocationMapPoint, rc.DISTRICT AS district, rc.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, rc.IS_OVER_15 AS isOver15, rc.LEADER_NN AS leaderNn, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CREW_MEMBER cm WHERE cm.CREW_ID = rc.CREW_ID) AS currentCount FROM RUNNING_CREW rc ORDER BY rc.CREW_ID DESC

SELECT rc.CREW_ID AS crewId, rc.CREW_TITLE AS crewTitle, rc.START_LOCATION AS startLocation, rc.END_LOCATION AS endLocation, rc.START_LOCATION_MAP_POINT AS startLocationMapPoint, rc.END_LOCATION_MAP_POINT AS endLocationMapPoint, rc.DISTRICT AS district, rc.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, rc.IS_OVER_15 AS isOver15, rc.LEADER_ID AS leaderId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CREW_MEMBER cm WHERE cm.CREW_ID = rc.CREW_ID) AS currentCount FROM RUNNING_CREW rc WHERE rc.CREW_ID = #{crewId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CREW_MEMBER ( CREW_ID, USER_ID, STATUS, JOINED_AT ) VALUES ( #{crewId}, #{userId}, #{status}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE RUNNING_CREW SET CREW_TITLE = #{crewTitle}, START_LOCATION = #{startLocation}, END_LOCATION = #{endLocation}, START_LOCATION_MAP_POINT = #{startLocationMapPoint}, END_LOCATION_MAP_POINT = #{endLocationMapPoint}, DISTRICT = #{district}, IS_OVER_15 = #{isOver15} WHERE CREW_ID = #{crewId}
